title: Rival wa Kimi no Ushiro ni
original_name: 恋敵〈ライバル〉は君のうしろに
sinopse:
Rintarou Asahi is a 2nd year high school boy who called out his senpai Shiori to a park in order to confess his love. As he readies to convey his feelings he realizes that they are not alone in the park and that someone was right behind them the whole time.

(Source: MU)
